page.shortlink: api desktop api most recently used database enum function
page.description: Return the most recently loaded databases.
page.discussion: The MOST_RECENTLY_USED_DATABASE_ENUM() function returns a CR-LF delimited list containing the fully qualified filenames of the eight different most recently used databases. Database names are not repeated, as found in the list of most recently used database under the Alpha Anywhere File menu.
page.example: dim cs as C cs = most_recently_used_database_enum() cs -> C:\Databases\Functions\Functions.Adb C:\Databases\Expressions Test\Expressions Test.Adb C:\Databases\Alphasports Official\Alphasports.Adb C:\Databases\Travel Time\Travel Time.Adb C:\Documents And Settings\Elarrabee\Desktop\To Delete\To Delete.Adb C:\Documents and Settings\ELarrabee\Desktop\To delete.adb C:\Program Files\A5v5\Samples\Alphasports\Alphasports.Adb C:\Databases\Backup\Backup.Adb
